title: Celebrating winter in the capital
caption: Celebrating winter in the capital
desc: Stretching some 7.8 kilometres through downtown Ottawa, the iconic Rideau Canal Skateway is the largest naturally frozen ice skating rink in the world. Between Jan. 31 and Feb. 17, visitors from across the country flock to the capital to enjoy the merry festival of Winterlude. This free annual event includes events featuring ice sculptures, snow playground, tube sliding, snowboarding lessons and lots more. An ode to highlighting Canada’s cultural and artistic diversity, Winterlude transforms the city into a giant winter wonderland for all ages.
copyright: Skating on the Rideau Canal during Winterlude in Ottawa (© Preappy/Getty Images)
